ess-beta-metadata.label: Premises below 30Mbps
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Percentage of premises that do not have access to services above 30Mbps
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This dataset shows the percentage of premises that do not have access to services above 30Mbps, UK, as of July 2025.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats: Some of this data has been aggregated and may show differences to other published figures.
